page.title: 15Chyvarhas Old People's home
page.content:
{ Chyvarhas}is an{old people's home.
It is 25 years old and was built in 1970. The 24 staff include 11{care {takers, 2 cooks and the rest are {helpers.} There are 37 bedrooms with mostly 2 beds and 1 cupboard. Many people have got Parkinsons Disease which makes them shake badly. Some people have got speech impediments after they have had a stroke. To fill in their time they{talk, {watch TV, play darts, knit and eat. Every day they have different sorts of food set out with various pills, for example: they have brown or white bread, fish, meat, lettuce, steak and kidney pie.
